channel.title: Thieving on one side only [pi]
channel.description:
hey guys, with my pi server i have a fish stall and i can only thieve on one side of it, it doesn't matter if i turn the stall around, i can still only thieve off that one side, this side is the side the npcs face, does anyone know how to fix?
and also when i add someone to my friends list it kicks me and then takes there name off friends list? does any know know how to fix these?
thankyou
